response.overview: Two friends, AMAN and RATIN, stumble upon a mysterious mirror in the jungle. Despite Ram's warnings, Sham triggers a haunting curse. As eerie events unfold, they discover the mirror's connection to a tragic, cursed family. Desperate to free a trapped soul, they follow its instructions together, but a sinister twist leaves one of them forever trapped with the same soul in his body.
response.title: Pukaar
